website_summaries.verdict: Classic design meets modern technology in this high-quality, innovative rower.
pros: Designed to simulate real-life, outdoor rowing experience
Includes cover to protect from dirt and dust
cons: Unique design comes with a high price tag

customer_reviews.title: SPM is not correct, but it's a nice rower.
customer_reviews.text: It's a very reasonable deal for a wood frame water rower, but the SPM does not register accurately on my rower. So when I row at what would be around 20 or 22 strokes per minute it registers 115 strokes per minute. The seller told me not to worry about it. Which is disappointing, but I can still get a great workout from the machine. If you need/want the monitor to read correctly spend the extra money to invest in a waterrower or concept 2. If you are only concerned with getting a good workout, then this is a good deal.
customer_reviews.author: Jerjuan Graham

customer_reviews.title: reliable and highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I am very satisfied with this order ,and really want to have a rowing machine which is fit to my room. I would recommend Oak wood rowing machine to people who want to have nice work out in their house with a high quality rowing machine
customer_reviews.author: bruce

customer_reviews.title: Well built and great look
customer_reviews.text: There was a delay in shipment but seller was very helpful in sorting it out. Product is very well built and sturdy. It surprisingly mimics real boat rowing well and feels like rowing an actual boat for a great at home workout. The wooden look of the machine also gives it a very nice aesthetic look in the house which is very different from most of the rowing machines seen in gyms.
customer_reviews.author: Techie

customer_reviews.title: Incomplete Shipment Received
customer_reviews.text: We only received one box. Looking at the Q & A, we should’ve received two boxes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Real water rowing experience
customer_reviews.text: i finally got time to put together my rowing machine that i’ve received about a week ago. surprisingly it’s quite easy to assemble. this is absolutely amazingly beautiful - the ash wood color exactly matches my floor; it’s getting cold in new york that i seldom wanted to go out. this rowing machine gives me a live water rowing experiences, which definitely became a must-have home workout equipment!
customer_reviews.author: Mag

customer_reviews.title: No Customer service information
customer_reviews.text: The product the is easy to assemble, and maneuverability is very good. Construction of the product is of good quality. The only issue is there is no contact information that comes with if there is an issue. Our rower did not come with a fill guide which is suppose to be on the side of the water tank. I scoured the accompanying paperwork and all it had was some face book pages that I was not even able to find. Not having any customer support means I would not purchase or recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: chuck

customer_reviews.title: Perfect addition for my garage gym
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, did it by myself (40 yr old female) in about 30 mins. I appreciated the affordable price. It rows smoothly and feels very similar to the WaterRower brand. It feels sturdy. Only time will tell if it holds up after years of use.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Smith

customer_reviews.title: Stores easily and looks good!
customer_reviews.text: The machine is beautiful, easy to set up, and a joy to use. Once you learn the proper rowing form, it’s a smooth rhythm and it’s almost like being on the water. You can tell it's quality and will last a long time. Found this hidden gem in rowing machine market from the same brand’s kitchenware.
customer_reviews.author: P.

customer_reviews.title: Good machine with some cheap parts
customer_reviews.text: The wooden frame is built very well, but the straps have started fraying very bad very quickly. I'm not sure how long they are going to last at this rate.
customer_reviews.author: Brendon Rockey

customer_reviews.title: Great Rowing Machine and Spectacular Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: I've been rowing since my teenage years, both on and off the water, even competitively for a few years. This is a great machine –– esp. at this price. It took a little less than an hour to put together; it's easy to operate (once you've figured out the display options), and runs smoothly and swooshingly. My belt was a little frayed, and the cord a little long (I'm tall), but their customer service replied immediately and sent out replacements. I'd certainly buy this machine again; and I'll certainly buy from the company again.
customer_reviews.author: Ogel

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: Just put it together so this is an early review, but I'm very pleased thus far. I don't have any of the issues other people mentioned (my computer seems correct, the tank has a gauge and the siphon pump works well), it Arrived in a few days, and at a reasonable price during Corona time too! A great mother's day gift for my wife - she's the rower and she says it feels very natural and a great replacement for going out on the water (I'll certainly use it too).
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey L. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: excillent item
customer_reviews.text: Just decided to build a little home gym and had been searching for a water rowing machine. This one comes with great deal but equivalent quality to any other machines that I have used before. The oak wood material makes it a beautiful decoration at home too. My whole body was burning after the workout and I am very satisfied with exercising with it.
customer_reviews.author: Ziming

customer_reviews.title: Not the experience i expected, I would have returned it if I could
customer_reviews.text: while customer service is great, the product does not meeting expectation on any aspect I can think of and expected. It feels cheap from the foot stands to the monitor - the lowest quality possible
customer_reviews.author: arik

customer_reviews.title: Smooth rower.  Great product for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Product is well made, but is not solid oak as I had thought it would be. It is a laminate, but a very good laminate. The type of wood will not affect the function of the machine. It rows very smoothly and is a great product for the price. I personally wouldn't pay the extra $1000 for solid wood. I would recommend this product instead. The construction is otherwise virtually the same.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A rower that works and is reasonably priced for your home work out facility!
customer_reviews.text: I have always wanted to have a rowing machine, but never seemed to bite the bullet and buy one, then I ran across this one on Amazon and figures for the money, this would be the one to take a chance on. Assembly took me about a half an hour, no instructions needed, but were reliable, FYI. The only issue with the install was that there was no markings on the water reservoir for how much water to place in system. Hopefully they can fix that for future purchasers. Performance of system has been flawless for the past 2 weeks, all seems to be functioning correctly.
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: Much easier to assemble than anticipated, just a bit time-consuming. Seat is cushioned (i.e. not rock hard like plastic) but could be softer/more cushioned. Easy to fill with the included pump, which can be charged with an included usb cord. We used 3 large bottles of purified water. This was a Few weeks ago and no sign of any discoloration. Could use some clear instructions for the computer but I don’t really use it except to time myself. Overall, very happy with this - exactly what I was looking for and lot less expensive than the other brands with the same design.
customer_reviews.author: My List

customer_reviews.title: Bad product, bad seller.
customer_reviews.text: Garbage particle board construction. Could not be assembled due to poor manufacturing tolerance. Seller revised to pay return shipping so I'm out $250. It is cheaper in the end to just buy Water Rower and get a high quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Silly pants

customer_reviews.title: Great rowing manchine
customer_reviews.text: I love the rowing machine and I had a problem with the computer working and later found the sensor was not close to the pulley, I pushed it closer and now works. Now workouts are fun and I use it almost everyday.
customer_reviews.author: K HOGAN

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with the Mr. Rudolph rower
customer_reviews.text: This unit so far seems to be very sturdy. I just received it within the last few days and set it up in approx 20 minutes by myself. Very easy for the mechanically inclined. I have used the rower for a total of 30 minutes and have found no issues. Just be sure all bolts and screws are fastened properly and your ready to go. The great thing about the unit is that it is low impact for your joints, it is very smooth and you can stand it up for out of the way storage. Also, I like the solid oak look instead of the metal units out there.
customer_reviews.author: John E

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Assembly was easy, build quality is great. The digital panel that tracks your real time activity is hard to see (LCD characters are dim, even with new batteries) but that's not a big deal. Looks great, works great.
customer_reviews.author: D. Steinlage

customer_reviews.title: Great rowing machine for great price- Superb company responsiveness
customer_reviews.text: The rowing machine was delivered in two separate deliveries, and was easy to set up. We had a problem with one part and contacted the seller who very rapidly replaced the part without any questions, then followed up to assure that we had no further issues. The rowing machine is very similar to a previous water rower we owned several years ago. The build of the product is very sturdy, and the mechanics appear to work well. The rowing motion is smooth and the seat and handle are comfortable. Bottom line, a well-made product with top-notch company backing.
customer_reviews.author: HIwamoto

customer_reviews.title: Good rower, easy to assemble, but monitor DOES NOT WORK!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a good looking rower. It's easy to assemble. But a huge part of a rower is the little screen that tells you how fast you're going, how far you've gone, etc. The monitor turns on and starts measuring something when you start rowing. But the numbers are WAY off. The only feature on the monitor that works is the timer.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Fits a big guy
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, 3 months of daily use no issues. PS I'm 6'4", 250 lbs. It's holding up nicely
customer_reviews.author: Garland A.

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase. I would recommend!
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived quickly in two boxes. Very easy to assemble and fill the water tank. The instructions were clear and east to understand. The rower works great. The materials are beautifully made and it feels super sturdy. I did have an issue with the foots straps being a little too short, but after contacting customer service, the seller offered to send me a new custom made strap. Good customer service and quick to reply. Overall I'm really happy with this rower. I'd recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Ronnie

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: These people are Awesome in customer service. A bit tricky to get straight to Them (through Amazon gate-keepers), but once through they immediately responded to a concern of mine well-above what was needed. This is a SUPER product and MUCH better priced than the alternative. HIGHLY recommend and I am one of those who keeps silent through all transactions.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Swigart

customer_reviews.title: Good customer service, solid rower that performs consistently
customer_reviews.text: The assembly instructions were very clear and it was easy to put together, even by myself. I like how sturdy it is. I've owned it for several months. It hasn't lost any water. The customer service is good. When the seat arrived damaged, I contacted the seller and they sent me a new seat promptly after I sent photos. The only reason I give this 4 stars instead of 5 is due to the quality of the part they used to track progress (digital counter). It could be improved, but it is adequate.
customer_reviews.author: StacyD

customer_reviews.title: Great service great machine
customer_reviews.text: When I received it the instructions for water maintenance were not clear I was not informed properly and my water became discolored. I will now only use the recommended treatment chemical The manufacturer sent me a new machine and was very helpful The machine runs smooth. Very happy with Mr.Rudolph The price is awesome Anthony
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: NOT WORTH IT
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY this tower, it will break within a month and if you request a return from the dealer it is at your own expense! This thing must eat like 200lbd how much will that be!? And what box will fit it? And how does one get such a heavy item out of a second story apartment by yourself? Bad construction. The pulley system is off, I went online to the WaterRower.com (competitor) website to try and fix this myself instead of returning. What a headache. Just buy the American made model on WaterRower, this is cheap and won’t last.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Great alternative to more expensive rowers!
customer_reviews.text: Only having used it a few times since it came a few days ago, I can tell my money was well spent. The rower is exactly like a more expensive brand at a bargain price. The quality is great and it seems to be working well. I only have one gripe so far and its the monitor screen which isn't backlit which makes it almost impossible to see. I would have maybe paid a little more for that option but overall I am happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: K_fire

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to put together. The rowing motion with the water mimics rowing a boat. Easy to operate. I recommend viewing instructional videos for rowing in order to prevent injury. I am extremely pleased with this rowing machine. Good quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Minor assembly issue was resolved
customer_reviews.text: I had a minor assembly issue and I reached out to the seller. Both Jessie and Niki have been a pleasure to deal with. They came up with a plan to resolve my concerns and hopefully a replacement part arrives shortly. I can’t say enough good things about this company. The quality and performance of the rowing machine is very impressive. I could have easily spent much more for a rower and not have had such quality. I look forward to using the tower every day.
customer_reviews.author: mark g. herll

customer_reviews.title: Anxious to Use
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble .. need understandable instructions on the pump that comes with it.. what is it used for and what does it fit ? How do you fill water tank instructions would be helpful.. my water tank is still empty and there is a piece of plastic (hard) about 2” long in the tank.. is this going to affect the rowing once I figure out how to put water in it .. do you sell the part seperate ? Thank you
customer_reviews.author: kathy

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful rower
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic rower! Arrived much sooner than expected in two boxes. Good quality. Easy to assemble. Glides smoothly and has a comfortable seat. I filled with distilled water. Started with three gallons but can add to it for more resistance in the future. The pump worked great. I love the sound of the water as I row.
customer_reviews.author: KDL

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Love this water rower it’s compliments my Peloton bike perfectly! Love the natural wood look the water sounds and it gives a great workout. The company is wonderful fast response and attentive a+++ in my book!
customer_reviews.author: Niknac

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome... it's sturdy, runs smooth and it's a great workout. I've never used a water rower before but after doing some research I went this this unit and I couldnt be happier with it. It also connects to your phone via Bluetooth and there's an app that works well to track your workouts. For anyone considering a water rower I would highly recommend this one
customer_reviews.author: AJR

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality LCD
customer_reviews.text: I am only giving a 3 stars. I am having problems using the LCD. Pricing rower with poor display and functions. The LCD quality is not good and feels very cheap. Using it is not intuitive and too complicated. You need to read the manual each time you do your work out. Considering the price tag $700, I think this rower deserves a better technology/LCD.
customer_reviews.author: Rene Manzo

customer_reviews.title: Must Buy Great work out!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product!!! This company was 100 percent outstanding in following up and ensuring the product was delivered and worked properly. Must buy item!
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda John

customer_reviews.title: Realistic Rowing!
customer_reviews.text: As a child I spent many hours rowing an old fishing boat on the St. Mary's River in Northern Michigan, and this rowing machine felt immediately like actual rowing. I love it! With headphones on and a few good songs going, I find myself lasting longer and longer each time I get on. The seat rolls very smoothly and quietly, and the water makes just the right "swoosh" sound like oars in water. My husband is using it as well, and at 6'1" he has plenty of room to make full, stretched out "strokes".
customer_reviews.author: FLYNN

customer_reviews.title: Working out at home now
customer_reviews.text: I was attending a gym pre-covid that used water rowers. I really liked the workout and wanted to expand my home workout options. The rower arrived on time, and was easy to assemble. I like that it is quiet, and doesn't need to be plugged in. It rolls away easily if you need to, but I chose it partly for its good looks, so I'll leave it out mostly. It comes with a dust cover too, which is nice. I spread out my payments with Amazon, and its cheaper than the gym.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Backman

customer_reviews.title: 10 stars
customer_reviews.text: Seriously love this thing. It is so sturdy and solid, nothing cheap about it. I shopped around online for weeks and I am so glad I went with this one. It is so easy to set up too. Quiet and very easy to use. I would give 10 stars if I could.
customer_reviews.author: Marsha S.

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this a few months ago and so far it has been a great machine. Seller also was very responsive when I had a question. Easy assembly and I love that I can easily decide how hard of a workout I want- because the resistance is all what you put into it.
customer_reviews.author: Deato

customer_reviews.title: Loving it so far!
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. The rower comes in 2 shipments and you cannot assemble until you receive both boxes. The seller is very clear about that part so you must wait until both boxes arrive. The rower came 3 days before the estimated delivery date so that was great (SoCal to SoCal delivery). It rolls away for storage nicely and very well constructed. With my kids distance learning right now, they hop onto the rower for their PE time so it's working out great for the whole family.
customer_reviews.author: VP2

customer_reviews.title: Great rower
customer_reviews.text: This rower is great. Easy assembly , high quality. Fast delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Enjoyable exercise
customer_reviews.text: Some of the directions were skimpy- maybe lost in translation. The pictures in the German section helped. It took about 20 minutes to assemble. I love the machine, the water sounds are so soothing.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Moir

customer_reviews.title: Read the directions carefully. Get assistance to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful exercise machine. Like the water action and sound. It’s terrific😀
customer_reviews.author: RWD

customer_reviews.title: Great first week
customer_reviews.text: Great first week! After q few hiccups with the currier, I finally got my rower. Costumer service was very helpful. Assembly took 20-30 min aprox. After using a Concept2 in my gym, I was afraid this rower would disappoint me, it has not. The rower feels firm and the stroke is very evenly smooth. I’m very happy with the purchase and I hope this rower last for years.
customer_reviews.author: El Morro

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Rowing Machine
customer_reviews.text: We are thrilled with the machine. It has made working out during COVID easy. It provides a great workout and it is very high quality.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Best Water Rower!
customer_reviews.text: What an incredible rower! So easy to assemble, I did it all by myself, although it wouldn’t hurt to have someone help you out. I love this rower and the customer service is top notch! You won’t go wrong! What a workout!
customer_reviews.author: Charles P. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice, comfortable to use. Would recommend for the price, and looks better then metal and plastic machines, I think. I like the sound and feel of the real water, too.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Walter Kinka

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: High quality product at only half the price of most of its competitors. It is easy to assemble. Everything you need has been provided in the box. Great compact home cardio solution!
customer_reviews.author: Arthur Cao

customer_reviews.title: Reliable seller
customer_reviews.text: This is a very reliable seller. I had a problem with assembly and they really stand behind their product - going so far as sending me a customized how-to video. And their sales team are great.
customer_reviews.author: Eric J. Baum

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble and use
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together and use. Love my purchase. Great work out.
customer_reviews.author: Darryl Massington

customer_reviews.title: The things I would change
customer_reviews.text: Y’all do have an A+ piece of work it’s a fantastic and exquisite rower...all you have to do is put the hole in a more accessible location and making it a tad larger,about a 1/2”, would also be great other then that I wouldn’t Chang’s a thing Y’all do good work!!!
customer_reviews.author: Paul Figueira

customer_reviews.title: Better than more expensive versions.
customer_reviews.text: Like it all. Using for main exercise after four back surgeries.
customer_reviews.author: deborah boehler

customer_reviews.title: Great Product and Customer Service!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product for people who love to row. The water feature makes it seems as if you are actually on the water and the noise it makes is very meditative.
customer_reviews.author: Lauri B.

customer_reviews.title: The monitor is super dim and can't adjust the brightness . Everything else is good quality.
customer_reviews.text: The product is made by good quality oak wood, strong wood. I can tell the manufacture is quite decent. Except for the monitor, probably from other vendor. But it does not affect the rowing experience.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry

customer_reviews.title: Great item smooth movments
customer_reviews.text: easy put together and very quiet and great service ! Neighbors below said they never hear me use !
customer_reviews.author: Tyrone Biggins

customer_reviews.title: Nice product with good price
customer_reviews.text: Just moved to a new place and wanted to have something for a little home gym. This is a relatively affordable choice for me as a student but its quality is not compromised. It really has the real water rowing experience as it is described. I would recommend this product to my work out buddies.
customer_reviews.author: Bobo

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this. Great replacement for the rowing exercising from orange theory.
customer_reviews.author: Lkarnold

customer_reviews.title: Great costumer service
customer_reviews.text: It's a well constructed machine and have the luxury look and supper easy to assemble. I have few questions regarding the product and contacted the costumer service. They were helpful and super friendly.
customer_reviews.author: Eddieta

customer_reviews.title: Great for attics and half-level upper floors!
customer_reviews.text: This was the perfect piece of exercise equipment for our low ceiling space!
customer_reviews.author: Morgan France

customer_reviews.title: Very Sturdy and useful
customer_reviews.text: I don't usually go to gym, and I find it very useful to exercise at home. It cheap compared to the other sellers, and the quality is good. I personally recommend buying.
customer_reviews.author: Huake He

customer_reviews.title: You're not going anywhere, but you'll be thinner
customer_reviews.text: Assembly was easy. I was pleasantly surprised how little space it needed for storing. I bought this because of the need for a machine that can handle 300 pounds, so far SSI good
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great and a good workout!
customer_reviews.text: Love my rower, easy to assemble, fun to use and nice quality! Would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Joel Luton

customer_reviews.title: This comes in two separate packages.
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, the product did come in two separate packages,.
customer_reviews.author: brett secor

customer_reviews.title: A great value for a water rower
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived on-time and was very easy to assemble. I have used it everyday since.
customer_reviews.author: Rick B

product_meta.title: Mr Rudolf Water Rowing Machine with Bluetooth Monitor,Wooden Rower Oak Rowing Machines Home Use Gyms Training Sports Exercise Equipment Fitness Indoor
feature_bullets: EQUIPPED WITH CUSTOMIZABLE BLUETOOTH MONITOR - You can setup 3 modes, they are Manual, Interval Custom and Target. It’ll help you manager your time and accomplish your exercise goal easier.

REAL WATER ROWING EXPERIENCE - The shape of water rowing machine is professionally designed like a real ship , which will perfectly bring you a feeling of real-life outdoor rowing experience, but in the comfort of your sweet home and on your own time. They are the ideal rowing machines for home use.
COMFORTABLE WORKOUT - Make the most out of your workout as it comes with ergonomic seat, active recoil system, and height adjustable footplates with straps.
CONVENIENT STORAGE - It features transport wheels for easy movement and simply lift it on its end and store out of the way against your wall or closet when not in use.

BUILD FOR HOME GYM - The indoor rowing machine is made with a solid oak wood dual rails, making it perfect for everyday training. Water rower dimensions: 82 L x 22 W x 20 H inches; Weight: 58.5 Pounds; Maximum User Weight Capacity : 320 pounds.
